data.title: Church of the Sacred Heart, Hove, Brighton
data.meta_description: A very warm welcome to our Sacred Heart parish website. We are a vibrant and welcoming community of over 600 worshippers here in the centre of Hove.
data.text:
Universalis has a free Order of Mass so you can follow simply by scrolling down that page, with your responses in bold black text. If you prefer an App, Universalis also offers a great one for a tenner that automatically loads the exact text and readings for the day, even for our diocesan feasts.

All of these courses are free.

Rosary and Divine Mercy: Fridays 11.00am

No signup required, just tune into Live Services like you do when you watch mass online.

To sign up for the following email together@sacredhearthove.org.uk

Christian Meditation: First Friday of the month

I run an online group at 10.00 on the first Friday of the month. We follow the teaching of the late Fr John Main OSB. (www.wccm.org) The meetings last just under an hour. If you would like to receive the link, please e mail me: timothypcullen@gmail.com

******
